Frequently Asked Questions

How can I report a bug?

You can report bugs through our Discord community, email us directly, or use the contact form above. Please include your system specifications and steps to reproduce the issue.

Do you offer internships or remote work?

Yes! We're a remote-first studio and regularly offer internship opportunities. Check our Discord announcements or email us with your portfolio and area of interest.

Can I suggest features for your games?

Absolutely! We love hearing from our community. Join our Discord or use the contact form to share your ideas. While we can't implement every suggestion, we read and consider all feedback.

Are you interested in publishing other developers' games?

Currently, we're focused on our own projects, but we're open to discussing unique collaboration opportunities. Please email us with details about your project.

How can I become a beta tester?

Join our Discord community! We regularly recruit beta testers from our most active community members. Beta opportunities are announced in our Discord server first.

Do you accept unsolicited portfolios?

Yes, we welcome portfolios! Even if we don't have immediate openings, we keep talented individuals in mind for future opportunities. Email us with your portfolio and preferred contact method.

Response Times

Email: 24-48 hours | Discord: Usually within a few hours | Phone: During business hours (9 AM - 5 PM SAST)

For urgent technical issues, Discord is often the fastest way to get help from our community and team.
